verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parvathamaa nee vepaati zerubbabelu Edutanu sama bhoomi vaguduvu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Janulandaroo krupa kalugu nanagaa Thaanunchun pai raatin{/lang-eng}
